title: 'Presidents Are Powerful But...': Indian-Origin Lawyer On Trump's Tariff Blow
summary_full: At the centre of the landmark US Supreme Court verdict striking down President Donald Trump's sweeping global tariffs is an Indian-origin lawyer who argued before America's highest court about the illegality of the levies.
